topic.title: Using zeronet in Local Area Network
topic.body: If I have 2 machines with different sites both in the same LAN. Assuming with totally different trackers. Will them exchange data automatically?

topic.title: How to use Safari browsing zeronet?
topic.body:
Say I've already opened a zeronet server on the PC. The PC and mobile device are in the same WAN. ip 
 address of the PC is 192.168.1.100:43110. Why it cannot be browsed via Safari on iOS devices by simply input 192.168.1.100:43110?
